text: Soham Shah is a Bollywood movie director who is popularly known for directing the films Kaal (2005) and the movie Luck (2009).. ==Personal life== Soham Shah is from Mumbai. ==Career== Soham Shah previously used to work for Dharma Productions and producer Karan Johar but they have recently split ways. He is now working for Kumar Mangat. He has also expressed an interest in directing Gujarati films. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Gujarati people Category:Film directors from Gujarat
title: Soham Shah
